name: Strikers 1945 Plus Portable
description:
Crush those that stand in your way! A new threat has waged war against humanity. The famous Strike-Force is called into action to stop the threat and save mankind. Do you have what it takes? Take to the sky and eliminate the enemy.
• Revamped graphics and smoother gameplay.
• Control one of six fighters each with unique abilities and attacks.
• Unlock hidden features such as new fighters and power-ups to defeat your foes.
• Incredible single player action with the all new Endless play mode created only for the PSP®.
• Host or join a game through Multiplayer Mode, for non-stop 2 player co-op action
2009 PM Studios, Inc. and the PM Studios, Inc. logo are trademarks of PM Studios, Inc. Strikers 1945 Plus is a trademark of Psikyo Corp. All rights reserved. All other trademarks and copyrights are properties of their respective owners.
